subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong’s first Giro d’Italia will begin with a team trial in Venice and finish with an individual race against the clock alongside Rome’s ancient ruins. Organizers unveiled a highlight-filled route for the 100th anniversary edition of the race on Saturday inside Venice’s opera house, La Fenice.
